title: How do I connect my phone to a WLAN network?
answer:
1. On the home screen, touch Settings > Wi-Fi. 

 1. Turn Wi-Fi on. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110587) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110588)

 [Your phone will automatically scan and list available hotspots nearby. Touch a desired hotspot. In the displayed dialog box, type the password and connect to Wi-Fi. ]()
